title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.13 - Vehicles under special hauling permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.13 - Vehicles under special hauling permit

State Regulations

Vehicles, including tandem trailer combinations, operating
on the Thruway system under special hauling permit shall be required to comply
with all pertinent rules and regulations, as well as to all additional
requirements imposed by the Thruway Authority as conditions for the issuance or
the continuing validity of the permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
103.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
